body_html:
When I trained distribute ,only the chief worker has log files, and all workers print logs while in the training,ps no log nor log files.

single machine train log is below

body:
When I trained distribute ,only the chief worker has log files, and all workers print logs while in the training,ps no log nor log files.
 
single machine train  log is below
```
INFO:tensorflow:Saving checkpoints for 9301 into /data0/users/gaolei7/tensorflow-test/MonitoredTrainingSession_test/log1/model.ckpt.
```
